name: Local Indicator
author: Tom J Nowell, Interconnect/IT

sections.description: An easy way of telling apart different installs of WordPress ( e.g. live/production/local ) via the admin bar. Super admins see a colour coded machine name in the admin bar, with an IP submenu. Mobiles will see a colour coded square dot
sections.installation:
1. Upload local-indicator.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: A fast way of seeing which machine a WordPress install is running on.
description: An easy way of telling apart different installs of WordPress ( e.g. live/production/local ) via the admin bar. Super admins see a colour coded machine name in the admin bar, with an IP submenu. Mobiles will see a colour coded square dot

upgrade_notice.1.6:
• Switched to add_node
    • Added PHP version to submenu
    • Added the hostname to the submenu for when in mobile view
    • Added a LOCALINDICATOR_ALWAYS_SHOWING define option
    • Added a LOCALINDICATOR_TEXT define option ( filters take precedence )
upgrade_notice.1.5:
• Fixed responsive view
    • Flattened and removed text shadows to fit in with MP6
    • Strict warning fixes
